plot: Leninha is forced to marry Paulo, a man she doesn't love. For that reason, she refuses to consummate the marriage. But she falls increasingly in love with her brother-in-law, Maurício.
title: Meu Destino é Pecar
plot_es: Leninha is forced to marry Paulo, a man she doesn't love. For that reason, she refuses to consummate the marriage. But she falls increasingly in love with her brother-in-law, Maurício.
plot_en: Leninha is forced to marry Paulo, a man she doesn't love. For that reason, she refuses to consummate the marriage. But she falls increasingly in love with her brother-in-law, Maurício.
